start: bot_info: your messege will be told to my master.
message_received_receipt: bot_info: your messege have been told to my master.
reply_to_no_message: bot_info: please send a messege to me.
reply_type_not_supported: bot_info: not support type to reply.
reply_message_sent:
bot_info: the messege have been replied.
receiver：%s ([link](tg://user?id=%s))
please_setup_first: bot_info: please setup the bot first.
blocked_alert: bot_info: cannot reply due to the user stop the bot.
reply_message_failed: bot_info: please retry due to the failed action.
warning_start_conversation: bot_info: to start conversation, you need to run /say directive first.
warning_admin_only: bot_info: this directive is only available for my master.
warning_end_conversation: bot_info: to run other bot functions, you need to run /done to end conversation first.
notify_conversation_start: bot_info: you can talk to me now.
